question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding the National Green Tribunal Act?
1) It was passed in 2010.
2) It was enacted under India’s constitutional provision of Article 21
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The National Green Tribunal Act was enacted by the government of India in 2010. This Act was enacted under India’s constitutional provision of Article 21 which ensures right to protection of life and personal liberty.
